title: Shared Teams: Reuse a Team Across Multiple Contexts
summary: Create a shared team at the org level and apply it to new contexts; optionally allow local extension.

steps.label: Create a shared team
steps.action: New Shared Team; clear name; optionally allow local extension in associated contexts.

steps.label: Use shared team when creating a context
steps.action: Select shared team; decide if local additions are permitted.
steps.verify: Context shows shared team roles/members; local additions respect settings.

steps.label: Where‑used report
steps.action: From the shared team page, run ‘Show Team Uses’.
steps.verify: Report lists contexts using this shared team.
